'''Ruin Sentinel''' is an enemy group of [[Automatons]] found in the regions of [[Inazuma]], [[Enkanomiya]], [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]], and [[Sumeru]] and are usually found in groups. They are designed to mimic different organisms found in Teyvat.

As [[Ruin Machines]], all Ruin Sentinels use [[Physical]] attacks and have increased [[Physical RES]].

When dormant, all Ruin Sentinels will take the form of a robotic cube.

==Types==
===Elite Enemies===
In combat, the cores of elite Ruin Sentinels will be exposed during certain attacks, which the player can hit to stagger or paralyze the Ruin Sentinel.
{{Enemies by Category List|Ruin Sentinels}}

===Normal Bosses===
*{{Enemy|Perpetual Mechanical Array}} &mdash; an enemy that can split into the four different Ruin Sentinels, in addition to being made out of them as one large machine.

==Trivia==
* Certain Ruin Sentinels will have a random title with the prefix Ald and ending with a numeric code.
** Possible titles include Ald-32624, Ald-82994, Ald-96176, Ald-64775, Ald-82780, Ald-95134, Ald-13110, Ald-52260, Ald-25442, Ald-48920, Ald-90256, Ald-27033, Ald-85541, Ald-70590, Ald-31302, Ald-46395.
* The Ruin Scout resembles the [https://honkai-impact-3rd-archives.fandom.com/wiki/Honkai_Beast#Jellyfish Psy Meduzoa] from ''{{w|Honkai Impact 3rd}}''.
* According to [[Muzhen]] during the [[Thunder Sojourn]] event, similar machines have once been dug up at [[The Chasm]], later revealed to be [[Ruin Serpent]]s.
* [[Karkata]] takes the form of a [[Ruin Defender]].
